product_name: Aqua-Bound Spark Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: An adjustable stand up paddle with an aluminum shaft and a fiberglass-reinforced resin blade, the Aqua-Bound Spark offers durable quality at an entry-level price. Aqua-Bound Spark Stand Up Paddle adjusts from 70 - 80 in. or 76 - 86 in. to fit varied applications or different size paddlers. Aluminum shaft offers high durability. Resin blade is smooth in the water and offers enhanced stiffness and strength thanks to a fiberglass reinforcement. Comfortable T-grip handle fits smoothly in your hands.
short_description: An adjustable stand up paddle with an aluminum shaft and a fiberglass-reinforced resin blade, the Aqua-Bound Spark offers durable quality at an entry-level price.
